body.name: ATUMTEK 55" Selfie Stick Tripod, All-in-one Extendable Aluminum Phone Tripod with Rechargeable Bluetooth Remote for iPhone, Samsung, Google, LG, Sony and More, Fitting 4.7-7 inch Smartphones, White

features: [All-in-One Multi-functional Design] The ATUMTEK Selfie Stick Tripod combines the functions of a selfie stick and a tripod, allowing users to switch modes freely to meet diverse shooting scenarios.

[Premium Materials and Exquisite Craftsmanship] Crafted with ABS+PC black injection molding technology, the body is not only durable but also visually elegant and sophisticated, making it a top choice for photography enthusiasts.

[Rechargeable Bluetooth 5.0 Remote] The built-in Bluetooth 5.0 remote features a rechargeable lithium battery with USB-C charging, boasting 50mAh capacity for over 20,000 photo captures on a single charge. With a wireless remote range of up to 10 meters, it provides users with a convenient photography experience. It is compatible with Bluetooth versions 5.0 and above on Android 5.0 and iOS 7.0 devices.
[Lightweight and Portable] Weighing only 350g and with a collapsed length of 310mm, the ATUMTEK Selfie Stick Bluetooth is compact and lightweight, ensuring hassle-free photography on the go.

[Wide Compatibility] The phone holder can rotate vertically up to 180° and horizontally up to 360°, supporting both portrait and landscape modes, as well as the newly added overhead mode. The adjustable clamp accommodates phones (from 4.7 to 7 inches) with a minimum width of 56mm and a maximum width of 92mm, ensuring stable and reliable support for smartphones of various sizes and operating systems.
[Comprehensive Protection] The selfie stick is equipped with anti-slip silicone pads, offering full protection to your smartphone and preventing accidental slips or scratches.
[Extended Shooting Range] With its 7-section telescopic design, the stick can extend up to 140cm, allowing users to capture wider angles and expansive views.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ATUMTEK Bluetooth Selfie Stick Tripod stands out with its quality craftsmanship and stability. Made from high-quality materials, it ensures reliable support and a steady shooting experience. Whether you're outdoors traveling, at a family gathering, or making a Vlog, it is your ideal companion.

Its light and portable design lets you capture exciting moments anytime, anywhere. The built-in Bluetooth 5.0 remote features a rechargeable lithium battery with USB-C charging. With a wireless remote range of up to 10 meters, it provides users with a convenient photography experience.

Previous page Next page The easy-to-use Bluetooth connection and flexible angle adjustments make shooting even more convenient. Whether you're a photography enthusiast or a regular user, the ATUMTEK Bluetooth Selfie Stick Tripod will enhance your shooting experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is beautiful and a great product. I ordered 4 tripods to decide from for my upcoming backpacking trip to Thailand. I ended up not choosing this one solely because it would not get small enough to fit in my fanny pack.It is easy to open and set up, get your phone on and off and like I said before the white color is gorgeous. I tested it out with my iPhone 15 pro max and it seemed sturdy and good quality while still being light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, light, long enough for most cases
reviews.reviewText: I’m very satisfied with this selfie stick, it is well designed, feels good in the hand, and it’s very light despite its massive size and length. Easy five-stars…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well and thoughtfully made.
reviews.reviewText: I like that it collapses into a single tube. No parts hanging out. My last selfie stick has the camera holder mounted perpendicular to the shaft so something was always hanging out and I lost that part the first day.This selfie stick has stable collapsible feet that go into the tubular case. Nothing is hanging out to be lost. The tubular case is about one inch in diameter and easily slides into a pack side pocket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is massive!
reviews.reviewText: I got this to bring on a cruise trip to Europe as I just got the new 15 Pro Max and decided to leave my DSLR at home. It worked great as advertised. Used it for family selfies and also as a tripod. The tripod feature is awesome. It is sturdy and was able to handle the weight of the 15 Pro Max. The phone holder has good grip. It was able to hold my phone all the time while walking about. The detachable USB-C rechargeable remote worked flawlessly. It was also easy to pair with my phone. It has a very stylish & expensive aesthetic. The only caveat of it being sturdy is that it is massive! It's a little over a foot when folded and 5" in diameter. You have to carry it in a bag (it does NOT come with a carrier bag) - it will not fit in your pocket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Both sturdy and rechargeable remote. Longest extension. Very pleased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very compact and solid.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. feels very sturdy. I love the brilliant white color. Make sure you take the stickers off before you try opening the leggings and removing the remote.The holder widened easily to hold my iPhone 14 Pro. It tilts to a full 90° on either side and spins around in 360° and clicks and hold the phone in place.The remote comes charged already and paired with both of my phones super fast.Press and hold the button for 3 seconds to turn on/off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Selfie Stick and Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used many times since purchasing. I like the adjustable height, versatility and stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast shipping & great quality
Elevate Your Photography Game with the ATUMTEK 55" Selfie Stick Tripod
reviews.reviewText: As a photography enthusiast, I'm always on the lookout for gadgets that can enhance my photo-taking experience. The ATUMTEK 55" Selfie Stick Tripod has been a game-changer for me. This all-in-one gadget is not just a selfie stick; it's a versatile tool that caters to a wide range of photography needs.The first thing that impressed me was the build quality. Made of sturdy aluminum, it feels durable yet lightweight, perfect for on-the-go photography. Its extendable nature, reaching up to 55 inches, is a feature that stands out, allowing me to capture shots from various angles and heights that were previously challenging.The tripod functionality is a significant upgrade from typical selfie sticks. It provides the stability needed for steady shots, group photos, and even long-exposure photography. The transition from selfie stick to tripod is seamless, making it highly convenient for different shooting scenarios.What makes this product even more appealing is its compatibility with a wide range of smartphones. The secure phone holder adjusts easily, ensuring my phone is safely anchored in place, regardless of its size.Another great feature is the Bluetooth remote. It's a small addition that makes a big difference, allowing me to take photos from a distance without needing assistance. This is particularly useful for solo travelers or content creators who often need to operate the camera remotely.In conclusion, the ATUMTEK 55" Selfie Stick Tripod is a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their photography. Whether you're a casual selfie taker, a travel blogger, or someone who enjoys capturing everyday moments, this tool provides flexibility, stability, and quality. It's compact, easy to use, and versatile - making it one of the best investments I've made in my photography gear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this recently for covering the Rolex Daytona 24hrs with an iphone 14pro. I found it fantastic for getting stable images both extended and retracted. The remote control was incredibly handy when taking photos over high crash fences. Also being able to semi-extend it and use the tripod for instance when seated made getting videos and photos much easier.Good overall build and material quality. I'd love to see the remote control have more functionality such as zoom.

reviews.reviewTitle: Selfie stick e treppiede tutto in uno
reviews.reviewText: E’ un selfie stick estensibile di altissima qualità e in un attimo si trasforma in un pratico treppiede!Tirando l’estremità verso l’alto (la parte dove si posiziona il telefono) è possibile estendere il manico telescopico in alluminio della lunghezza desiderata.All’estremità superiore, un sistema a molla, permette di fissare saldamente lo smartphone allo stick.Nell’estremità opposta è presente il treppiede che con un semplice gesto è subito aperto e operativo.Da notare inoltre la presenza di un pulsante integrato rimovibile e ricaricabile tramite usb-c, una volta connesso tramite bluetooth allo smartphone permette di controllare lo scatto a distanza.E’ un treppiede-selfie stick di alta qualità, una volta richiuso occupa pochissimo spazio.L’unica piccola nota, sarebbe stato di gradimento un’aggancio opzionale di tipo MagSafe per gli smartphone compatibili, ma tutto sommato è un ottimo accessorio.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ensemble à selfie robuste et haute !
reviews.reviewText: Nickel!!! vraiment pas mal du tout !!! tellement bien que ma fille me l'a pris hahahahLa perche vous sera livrée sous 24 hrs, ce qui n'est pas rien quand on est pressé comme je le suisA l'ouverture, on a une très bonne impression : le trépied est de qualité, solide, il pèse un petit poids qui permet stabilité et bon maintien, rien à voir avec des perches fragiles ou bas de gamme .Facile à déployer ou replier, on n’éprouve vraiment aucunes difficultés à le ranger.S’adapte à tous les modèles d'Iphone , anciens ( plus épais et petits) que les nouveaux ( plus fins et longs)Fonctionne très bien et sans soucisTrépied de qualité avec un bon compromis hauteur-poids-encombrement-stabilité-polyvalence

reviews.reviewTitle: Super pratique avec sa télécommande et sa bonne hauteur de deploiement
reviews.reviewText: Pour prendre des photos de famille, de paysages en étant dessus et sans avoir un bras tendu pour tenir une perche. La mini télécommande clipsée sur le manche est très pratique et discrète pour déclencher le smartphone à distance. Semble assez résistant et possibilité d’orienter la tête en portrait ou paysage.
